sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgbCarouselConfig, NgbCarouselModule } from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; import { NgFor, NgIf } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-carousel-comp', standalone: true, imports: [NgbCarouselModule, NgIf, NgFor], templateUrl: './carousel-comp.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carousel-comp.component.css'], providers: [NgbCarouselConfig], // add NgbCarouselConfig to the component providers }) export class CarouselCompComponent { showNavigationArrows = false; showNavigationIndicators = false; images = [ {title: 'First Slide', short: 'First Slide Short', src: "../../assets/images/cd.jpg"}, {title: 'Second Slide', short: 'Second Slide Short', src: "../../assets/images/cd.jpg"}, {title: 'Third Slide', short: 'Third Slide Short', src: "../../assets/images/cd.jpg"} ]; constructor(config: NgbCarouselConfig) { // customize default values of carousels used by this component tree config.showNavigationArrows = true; config.showNavigationIndicators = true; config.interval = 2000; config.keyboard = true; config.pauseOnHover = true; } }

Hello
First slide label

Some representative placeholder content for the first slide.
